title: Keeps Disconnecting
body:
My game has been frequently disconnecting recently. 
My ping goes to 500, the screen freezes up, and it shows a disconnected message. 

To test if it's a fault in my end, I tab out and try out my internet browser- to see if it loads anything up. To my surprise, I was able to load pages up. Not only that, I could also stream youtube videos with very little lag. I tab in back to the game, to see if it's finally working, but only see the same damn message: Reconnecting. 

To remove any other doubts, the LOL client was the only thing that was running for me. No Firewalls, no antiviruses, or HD movie downloads. Just me and the game. 

Was wondering if anyone else had this weird problem lately.

replies.body: same thing has been happening for me recently though more so with the stable ping then dropping for no reason and having to relog to get back in

Hoping this gets resolved soon... this issue started in the middle of my gold promos, and now have lost several games due to lag and weird issues.

So, in the mean time I'm playing hexakill until this blows over.

I went ahead and looked into your account and it appears that you are connecting from California.  Recently, there has been some ISP related issues on the West Coast and we have posted a bit more information about it [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Rf9Kx2Ed-northern-california-connectivity-issues?comment=0003).

It happens to me too. All I have to do is quit the game and reconnect. But the thing is... just the time it takes to reconnect I would 3-4 waves of minions and sets my early game far behind... its so stupid.
Heyo, is your ISP Comcast-Norcal by any chance?
